General.Name: Turvo International Co Ltd
General.Description: TURVO International Co., Ltd. develops and produces precision metal parts and components in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products have application in automotive engine systems, steering systems, transmission systems, safety systems, chassis systems, connectors for industrial communication applications, sensors, temperature control equipment, industrial automation, medical equipment components, and high-end bicycle components, etc. TURVO International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

1.Name: Xiao Rui  Wu
1.Title: Chief Accountant and Mang. of Financial Management Department
